title: INSIGHT: Turkish food for (very) small appetites
text:
INSIGHT: Turkish food for (very) small appetites 2:26pm BST - 00:49 
A couple cook miniature versions of popular Turkish dishes in a tiny kitchen with a working stove and range of utensils to help them promote culinary riches of the country. What started as a hobby 1.5 years ago turned into a challenging passion with over 40 recipes posted on their Youtube channel 'Mini Turk Mutfagi' which means Mini Turkish Kitchen in Turkish. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
